mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user (id, pw, email, location, nickname, introduce) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{location}, #{nickname}, #{introduce})
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.pw, u.email, u.location, u.signupday, u.nickname, u.introduce, u.profileurl, u.withdrawal, u.adminQuali, f.userId, f.url FROM tb_user u JOIN tb_file_user f ON u.id = f.userId WHERE email = #{email} and withdrawal = 'X'

SELECT id, pw, email, location, signupday, nickname, introduce, profileurl, withdrawal, adminQuali
FROM tb_user
WHERE email = #{email} and withdrawal = 'X'
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET pw = #{pw}, location = #{location}, nickname = #{nickname}, introduce = #{introduce} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_user SET withdrawal = 'O' WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.pw, u.email, u.location, u.nickname, u.introduce, u.profileurl, f.userId, f.url FROM tb_user u JOIN tb_file_user f ON u.id = f.userId WHERE withdrawal = 'X'AND nickname = #{nickname} GROUP BY nickname
SELECT id, pw, email, location, nickname, introduce, profileurl FROM tb_user WHERE withdrawal = 'X'AND nickname = #{nickname} GROUP BY nickname
SELECT id, pw, email, location, nickname, introduce, profileurl FROM tb_user WHERE withdrawal = 'X'AND email = #{email} GROUP BY email
